# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: r

Відповідь: _P$ with respect to $||\cdot||_2$.

§ Code

# P
P_op_norm = Linf_norm(P)
P_op_norm

§ Output

> ['4']


§ Code

# P^T
PT_op_norm = Linf_norm(P.T)
PT_op_norm

§ Output

> ['4']


§ Code

# P^-1
P_inv_op_norm = Linf_norm(inv(P))
P_inv_op_norm

§ Output

> ['0.1111111111111111']

 
§ Markdown

### Question 2
2. Find the spectral radius $r_P$ of $P$.

§ Code

# Calculates the eigenvalues
P_eig = np.linalg.eigvals(P)
# Calculates the largest eigenvalue in magnitude
P_largest_eig_mag = np.max(abs(P_eig))

# Calculates the spectral radius
r_P = P_largest_eig_mag
r_P

§ Output

> ['2.0000000000000004']

 
§ Markdown

### Question 3
3. Is $P$ strictly diagonally dominant?

§ Code

# Calculates absolute value of diagonal elements
P_diag_mag = np.abs([P[0,0], P[1,1], P[2,2], P[3,3]])
# Calculates sum of absolute value of off-diagonal elements
P_off_diag_sum_mag = np.sum([P[0,1], P[0,2], P[0,3], P[1,2], P[1,3], P[2,3]])

# Checks strict diagonal dominance
if (P_diag_mag > P_off_diag_sum_mag).all():
    print("Yes, P is strictly diagonally dominant.")
else:
    print("No, P is not strictly diagonally dominant.")

§ Output

> stdout : ['Yes, P is strictly diagonally dominant.\n']

 
§ END OF DOC
